title: The Witch Who Wanted to Be a Princess
description: It's as true today as it was a thousand years ago--some witches want to be princesses.Like Bella. She dreams of big castles, silk gowns, and jewels. But the Grand Wizard has placed a moratorium on witches turning themselves into anything, especially princesses, and Bella's dream turns to dust. Clever Bella has another marry a prince. A handsome one, if they haven't all been turned into frogs. And with a little online dating help that's exactly what she sets out to do.This funny story will have readers spellbound and laughing out loud at Bella's sweetly enchanting attempts to hook her handsome prince. Magical illustrations enhance this delightful tale.
author: Lois G. Grambling
